p: In the current scenario (CPH), ~ 54% of the suitable areas are shallower than 20 m deep, ~ 43% between 20–50 m, ~ 2% between 50–75 m and ~ 1% between 75–100 m ( Table 3). In the two future scenarios (RCPs), > 40% of the new areas suitable for the species were concentrated between 20 m and 50 m and > 19% between 50 m and 75 m, mostly to the south of the São Francisco River ( Table 3).
